title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Conduct research and gather requirements for the VR leadership shadowing experience, including target audience, learning objectives, desired features, and technical constraints.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the VR environment, simulation engine, user interface, data management components, and integration with external services (if any). Consider scalability, performance, security, and maintainability aspects. Define the high-level components, their interactions, and the data flow.

title: VR Environment Development
description: Develop the immersive VR environment, including realistic 3D models, animations, and interactive elements.

title: Simulation Engine Development
description: Develop the simulation engine that drives the leadership scenarios and AI-controlled characters.

title: User Interface Development
description: Develop the user interface for the VR experience, including menus, tutorials, and feedback mechanisms.

title: Data Management and Analytics
description: Implement data management and analytics systems to track user progress, performance, and learning outcomes.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the system adheres to relevant security standards and data privacy regulations.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and conduct thorough testing of the VR experience, including functionality, usability, and performance testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and monitoring systems for the VR experience.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation, user guides, and training materials for the VR experience.
